name: jabber
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to speak or say something quickly in a way that is difficult to understand: The train was full of people jabbering (away) into their mobile phones. He jabbered (out) something about an accident further down the road. Compare
rant verb
rave verb

Add to word list
Add to word list
to speak or say something quickly in a way that is difficult to understand: Jay was jabbering on about this and that.
